title: Did the Selective Service Harvest Names from a ‘Free Ice Cream’ List?
subtitle: A pair of brothers were surprised when the fictitious name they made up for a free yearly ice cream list received a Selective Service registration notice.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: A few years after a couple of kids used a made-up name to sign up for a free yearly ice cream cone, they received a Selective Service registration notice for their non-existent friend.
